languages.text: {n}Октавиана издает смешок.{/n} "Почему же! Знаете ли вы, где находитесь? На борту священного судна "Стойкость Мученика", приписанного флоту {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Адептус Администратум{/g}! Бюрократы сто лет назад прислали сюда свою миссию, чтобы основать департамент, наладить делопроизводство, перебрать весь Футфол по косточкам и устроить тут все по букве миллиардов законов. Ну, как видите, в итоге Футфол перебрал саму "Стойкость Мученика" и его обывателей. Куда те сгинули — того не знаю, зато заключать сделки и считать деньги местные предпочитают по прежнему здесь, в храме счетоводов Империума. Вон, даже вывеска осталась... частично".

traits.locale_text: {n}Октавиана издает смешок.{/n} "Как и весь Футфол, {mf|господин|госпожа}. Мы живем по странным правилам — вроде и имперским, а вроде и не совсем. Ну и вдобавок, разве такое имя — не признак нашего крайне почтительного и уважительного уважения к делу наливания выпивки?"

languages.text: {n}Octaviana chuckles.{/n} "What makes you say that? Do you know where you're standing? On the deck of the Martyr's Endurance, a sacred vessel that once belonged to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}! A hundred years ago, the bureaucrats sent a mission here to establish a department, set up some kind of record-keeping, overhaul Footfall, and make everything here follow a billion laws to the letter. As you can see, it was the Martyr's Endurance and its inhabitants that got overhauled in the end. I don't know what happened to them, but the locals like to come here to make deals and count their money like before, in this temple of the Imperium's accountants. Over there, you can see even the sign's been preserved... partially."
languages.original_text: {n}Октавиана издает смешок.{/n} "Почему же! Знаете ли вы, где находитесь? На борту священного судна "Стойкость Мученика", приписанного флоту {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Адептус Администратум{/g}! Бюрократы сто лет назад прислали сюда свою миссию, чтобы основать департамент, наладить делопроизводство, перебрать весь Футфол по косточкам и устроить тут все по букве миллиардов законов. Ну, как видите, в итоге Футфол перебрал саму "Стойкость Мученика" и его обывателей. Куда те сгинули — того не знаю, зато заключать сделки и считать деньги местные предпочитают по прежнему здесь, в храме счетоводов Империума. Вон, даже вывеска осталась... частично".

{n}Octaviana chuckles.{/n} "Much like all of Footfall, {mf|sir|ma'am}. We've got a strange set of rules here — sort of Imperial, sort of not. And hey, isn't a name like that a sign of our utmost reverence and respect toward the practice of pouring drinks?"

languages.text: {n}奥克塔维娜咯咯笑了起来。{/n}“你怎么会这么说？你知道你脚下是什么地方吗？你可是站在‘殉道之魂号’的甲板上，这艘神圣的舰船曾隶属于{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国内政部{/g}！一百年前，那些官员派遣布道所的人来这里，准备来这里建立帝国部门，把落脚港整顿一番，让这里的一切都遵守帝国那几十亿条法律。到了最后，你也看到了，反而是殉道之魂号和它的船员被整顿了。我不知道那些人最后怎么样了，不过当地人很喜欢来到这座帝国的神殿，像以前那样，在这里做生意、数钱。你可以看看那边，就连他们的印记都被保留下来了……一部分。”
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana chuckles.{/n} "What makes you say that? Do you know where you're standing? On the deck of the Martyr's Endurance, a sacred vessel that once belonged to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}! A hundred years ago, the bureaucrats sent a mission here to establish a department, set up some kind of record-keeping, overhaul Footfall, and make everything here follow a billion laws to the letter. As you can see, it was the Martyr's Endurance and its inhabitants that got overhauled in the end. I don't know what happened to them, but the locals like to come here to make deals and count their money like before, in this temple of the Imperium's accountants. Over there, you can see even the sign's been preserved... partially."

languages.text: {n}Octaviana lanza una carcajada.{/n} «¿Por qué dices eso? ¿Sabes dónde estás? ¡Estás en la cubierta del Aguante del Mártir, una nave sagrada que en su día formó parte del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}! Hace cien años, los burócratas enviaron una misión aquí a fin de establecer un departamento y montar una especie de lugar en el que se llevara un registro de las cosas, se reformara Paso y se siguieran un millón de normas al pie de la letra. Como ves, los que acabaron reformándose fueron el Aguante del Mártir y sus habitantes. No sé qué les pasó, pero los lugareños suelen venir a hacer tratos y a contar su dinero como antaño a este templo de contables del Imperio. Allí verás que el cartel se conserva más o menos bien...».
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana chuckles.{/n} "What makes you say that? Do you know where you're standing? On the deck of the Martyr's Endurance, a sacred vessel that once belonged to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}! A hundred years ago, the bureaucrats sent a mission here to establish a department, set up some kind of record-keeping, overhaul Footfall, and make everything here follow a billion laws to the letter. As you can see, it was the Martyr's Endurance and its inhabitants that got overhauled in the end. I don't know what happened to them, but the locals like to come here to make deals and count their money like before, in this temple of the Imperium's accountants. Over there, you can see even the sign's been preserved... partially."

Hace cien años, los burócratas enviaron una misión aquí a fin de establecer un departamento y montar una especie de lugar en el que se llevara un registro de las cosas, se reformara Paso y se siguieran un millón de normas al pie de la letra. Como ves, los que acabaron reformándose fueron el Aguante del Mártir y sus habitantes. No sé qué les pasó, pero los lugareños suelen venir a hacer tratos y a contar su dinero como antaño a este templo de contables del Imperio. Allí verás que el cartel se conserva más o menos bien...».

languages.text: {n}オクタヴィアナはクスクスと笑った。{/n}「ずいぶん酷い言われようだね。あんた、今どこに立ってるか知ってる？かつて{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国行政局{/g}が所有していた聖なる船、『殉教者の忍耐』だよ！100年前、官吏たちはここに聖務団を送り込んで、部署を設立し、なんらかの記録管理を整えてフットフォールを大改革し、あらゆる法律に忠実に従わせたんだ。見てのとおり、最終的に『大改革』されたのは『殉教者の忍耐』とその住民だったけどね。彼らに何があったのかは知らないけど、地元の奴らはここに来て取引をしたり、帝国の会計士の寺院だったこの場所で昔みたいに金を数えるのが好きなんだ。あそこに看板が見えるだろ？保存されているんだ…一部だけだけど」
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana chuckles.{/n} "What makes you say that? Do you know where you're standing? On the deck of the Martyr's Endurance, a sacred vessel that once belonged to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}! A hundred years ago, the bureaucrats sent a mission here to establish a department, set up some kind of record-keeping, overhaul Footfall, and make everything here follow a billion laws to the letter. As you can see, it was the Martyr's Endurance and its inhabitants that got overhauled in the end. I don't know what happened to them, but the locals like to come here to make deals and count their money like before, in this temple of the Imperium's accountants. Over there, you can see even the sign's been preserved... partially."

traits.locale_text: {n}オクタヴィアナはクスクスと笑った。{/n}「ずいぶん酷い言われようだね。あんた、今どこに立ってるか知ってる？かつて{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国行政局{/g}が所有していた聖なる船、『殉教者の忍耐』だよ！100年前、官吏たちはここに聖務団を送り込んで、部署を設立し、なんらかの記録管理を整えてフットフォールを大改革し、あらゆる法律に忠実に従わせたんだ。見てのとおり、最終的に『大改革』されたのは『殉教者の忍耐』とその住民だったけどね。彼らに何があったのかは知らないけど、地元の奴らはここに来て取引をしたり、帝国の会計士の寺院だったこの場所で昔みたいに金を数えるのが好きなんだ。あそこに看板が見えるだろ？保存されているんだ…一部だけだけど」

languages.text: {n}Octaviana kichert.{/n} "Wie kommt Ihr darauf? Wisst Ihr überhaupt, wo Ihr gerade steht? Auf dem Deck der Martyr's Endurance, einem heiligen Schiff, das einst dem {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} gehörte! Vor hundert Jahren schickten die Bürokraten eine Mission hierher, um eine Abteilung einzurichten, die über alles Aufzeichnungen führt, Footfall auf Vordermann bringt und dafür sorgt, dass alle eine Milliarde Gesetze genau befolgen. Wie Ihr seht, waren es die Martyr's Endurance und ihre Bewohner, die am Ende auf Vordermann gebracht wurden. Ich weiß nicht, was mit ihnen passiert ist, aber die Einheimischen kommen gerne her, um wie zuvor Geschäfte zu machen und ihr Geld zu zählen, hier in diesem Tempel der Buchhalter des Imperiums. Da drüben seht ihr das Schild, sogar noch erhalten ... teilweise."
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana chuckles.{/n} "What makes you say that? Do you know where you're standing? On the deck of the Martyr's Endurance, a sacred vessel that once belonged to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}! A hundred years ago, the bureaucrats sent a mission here to establish a department, set up some kind of record-keeping, overhaul Footfall, and make everything here follow a billion laws to the letter. As you can see, it was the Martyr's Endurance and its inhabitants that got overhauled in the end. I don't know what happened to them, but the locals like to come here to make deals and count their money like before, in this temple of the Imperium's accountants. Over there, you can see even the sign's been preserved... partially."

Auf dem Deck der Martyr's Endurance, einem heiligen Schiff, das einst dem {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} gehörte! Vor hundert Jahren schickten die Bürokraten eine Mission hierher, um eine Abteilung einzurichten, die über alles Aufzeichnungen führt, Footfall auf Vordermann bringt und dafür sorgt, dass alle eine Milliarde Gesetze genau befolgen. Wie Ihr seht, waren es die Martyr's Endurance und ihre Bewohner, die am Ende auf Vordermann gebracht wurden. Ich weiß nicht, was mit ihnen passiert ist, aber die Einheimischen kommen gerne her, um wie zuvor Geschäfte zu machen und ihr Geld zu zählen, hier in diesem Tempel der Buchhalter des Imperiums. Da drüben seht ihr das Schild, sogar noch erhalten ... teilweise."

languages.text: {n}Octaviana s'esclaffe.{/n} « Qu'est-ce qui vous fait dire ça ? Vous savez où vous êtes ? Sur le pont de l'Endurance du Martyr, un vaisseau sacré qui appartenait autrefois à l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} ! Il y a une centaine d'années, les bureaucrates ont envoyé une mission ici pour y fonder une division, mettre en place une sorte d'administration, restructurer Castel, et forcer tout et tout le monde à suivre un milliard de lois à la lettre. Comme vous pouvez le constater, c'est finalement l'Endurance du Martyr et ses passagers qui ont changé. Je ne sais pas ce qui leur est arrivé, mais les gens du coin aiment bien venir dans ce temple des comptables de l'Imperium pour conclure des marchés et compter leurs billets, un peu comme un hommage. Si vous regardez là-bas, on a même conservé l'enseigne... en partie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana chuckles.{/n} "What makes you say that? Do you know where you're standing? On the deck of the Martyr's Endurance, a sacred vessel that once belonged to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}! A hundred years ago, the bureaucrats sent a mission here to establish a department, set up some kind of record-keeping, overhaul Footfall, and make everything here follow a billion laws to the letter. As you can see, it was the Martyr's Endurance and its inhabitants that got overhauled in the end. I don't know what happened to them, but the locals like to come here to make deals and count their money like before, in this temple of the Imperium's accountants. Over there, you can see even the sign's been preserved... partially."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana s'esclaffe.{/n} « Qu'est-ce qui vous fait dire ça ? Vous savez où vous êtes ? Sur le pont de l'Endurance du Martyr, un vaisseau sacré qui appartenait autrefois à l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} ! Il y a une centaine d'années, les bureaucrates ont envoyé une mission ici pour y fonder une division, mettre en place une sorte d'administration, restructurer Castel, et forcer tout et tout le monde à suivre un milliard de lois à la lettre. Comme vous pouvez le constater, c'est finalement l'Endurance du Martyr et ses passagers qui ont changé. Je ne sais pas ce qui leur est arrivé, mais les gens du coin aiment bien venir dans ce temple des comptables de l'Imperium pour conclure des marchés et compter leurs billets, un peu comme un hommage. Si vous regardez là-bas, on a même conservé l'enseigne... en partie. »

languages.text: {n}Octaviana kıkır kıkır gülüyor.{/n} "Niyeymiş ki? Nerede durduğunuzu biliyor musunuz? Bir zamanlar {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum'a{/g} mensup olan kutsal gemi Şehit Sabrı'nın güvertesindesiniz! Bürokratlar; bir departman kursunlar, kayıt tutmaya başlasınlar, Binliman'ı baştan ayağa elden geçirsinler ve de buradaki her şeyin yasalara harfiyen uymasını sağlasınlar diye yüz yıl önce buraya bir misyon göndermiş. Gördüğünüz üzere, nihayetinde asıl elden geçirilen taraf Şehit Sabrı ve görevlileri olmuş. Onların başına ne geldi bilmem ama Binliman halkı, İmparatorluk saymanlarının bu tapınağına gelip anlaşma yapmaya ve para saymaya bayılır. Şu tarafa bakarsanız muhafaza edilmiş bir tabela bile görebilirsiniz... Yani kısmen diyelim."
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana chuckles.{/n} "What makes you say that? Do you know where you're standing? On the deck of the Martyr's Endurance, a sacred vessel that once belonged to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}! A hundred years ago, the bureaucrats sent a mission here to establish a department, set up some kind of record-keeping, overhaul Footfall, and make everything here follow a billion laws to the letter. As you can see, it was the Martyr's Endurance and its inhabitants that got overhauled in the end. I don't know what happened to them, but the locals like to come here to make deals and count their money like before, in this temple of the Imperium's accountants. Over there, you can see even the sign's been preserved... partially."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana kıkır kıkır gülüyor.{/n} "Niyeymiş ki? Acaba nerede durduğunuzu biliyor musunuz? Bir zamanlar {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}'un kutsal bir gemisi olan Şehit Sabrı'nın güvertesindesiniz! Bürokratlar; bir departman kursunlar, kayıt tutmaya başlasınlar, Binliman'ı baştan ayağa elden geçirsinler ve de buradaki her şeyin yasalara harfiyen uymasını sağlasınlar diye yüz yıl önce buraya bir misyon göndermişti. Gördüğünüz üzere, nihayetinde asıl elden geçirilen taraf Şehit Sabrı ve görevlileri oldu. Onların başına ne geldiğini bilmiyorum ama Binliman halkı, İmparatorluk saymanlarının bu tapınağına gelip anlaşma yapmaya ve para saymaya bayılır. Şu tarafa bakarsanız, kısmen muhafaza edilmiş bir tabela bile görebilirsiniz."
